statistic-enable.description: Whether BD statistics measurement is enable.

statistic-discard.description: Whether BUM discard statistics collection is enabled.

mac-aging-time.description: MAC address aging time, 0 indicates that MAC addresses do not age.

vlan-list.description: VLAN list. Currently, the node supports only one VLAN, and the VLAN is already created globally.

inbound-unknown-unicast-drops.description: Number of discarded unknown unicast packets in the inbound direction.

inbound-unknown-multicast-drops.description: Number of discarded unknown multicast packets in the inbound direction.

inbound-broadcast-drops.description: Number of discarded broadcast packets in the inbound direction.

vsi-name.description: The VSI name bound to the BD.

evpn-name.description: The EVPN name bound to the BD.

vni.description: The VNI ID bound to the BD.
